item.title: Deploy an ASP.NET Core Web App to an AKS Cluster
item.description: In this post I will demonstrate containerising a simple ASP.NET Core web app, pushing it to an Azure Container Registry (ACR), and then running it in a two-node Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster. It’s not too CLI heavy, and has a lot of manual steps. But it’s a good insight into the end-to-end process of how you can develop and test an app in AKS. The prerequisites you will need installed on your machine:
